 2002-10882002-06-200,  CCRA,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA PENSION PLAN REGULATIONS by replacing, as of January 1, 2002, the complicated formula which employers now use to determine the CPP premiums payable by their employees with a much simpler one that can be used indefinitely, year after year.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2002-0245 Publication Date: 2002-07-03
Attachments
precis:
Regulations Amending the CANADA PENSION PLAN REGULATIONS by replacing, as
of January 1, 2002, the complicated formula which employers now use to
determine the CPP premiums payable by their employees with a much simpler
one that can be used indefinitely, year after year.
